amendment.description: An amendment to strike all that follows after the enacting clause and inserts a new text.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bass amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Ms. Bass.
